data.lyric:
[ti:Hell Of A View]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Hell Of A View]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hell Of A View - Eric Church
[00:01.91]LyrIcs by：Eric Church/Casey Beathard/Monty Criswell
[00:03.83]Composed by：Eric Church/Casey Beathard/Monty Criswell
[00:05.74]I was no daddy's dream
[00:08.02]Was not your momma's prayer
[00:10.52]But I was your first and your
[00:12.79]Last ticket out of there
[00:15.33]I caught your wings on fire
[00:17.62]When I smoked my bronco tires
[00:20.33]Out of that town
[00:25.09]I'm good at rollin' dice
[00:27.44]No good at standin' still
[00:29.81]You liked the thought of chasin'
[00:31.87]Life instead of dollar bills
[00:34.69]We were livin' wreckless
[00:37.04]Nothin' to catch us baby
[00:39.34]But the ground
[00:44.39]This ain't for everybody
[00:46.69]Toes hangin' off the ledge
[00:49.17]Like we got nothin' to lose
[00:54.03]Ain't always Heaven baby
[00:56.40]This livin' on the edge
[00:58.97]You holdin' me holdin' you
[01:02.17]It's a Hell of a view
[01:08.71]I paint with my old Gibson
[01:11.07]You paint your purple sky
[01:13.48]This town's our canvas baby
[01:15.80]Let's paint it red tonight
[01:18.24]Go out like shootin' stars
[01:20.63]Chasin' what's in our hearts
[01:22.98]Into thе blue Into the blue
[01:28.15]This ain't for everybody
[01:30.39]Toes hangin' off the ledge
[01:32.82]Like we got nothin' to lose
[01:37.78]Ain't always Heaven baby
[01:40.19]This livin' on the edge
[01:42.51]You holdin' me holdin' you
[01:45.91]It's a Hell of a view
[01:51.01]A Hell of a view
[02:06.88]We ain't for everybody
[02:09.13]Toes hangin' off a ledge
[02:11.58]Like we got nothin' we got nothin' to lose
[02:16.45]Ain't always Heaven baby
[02:18.82]This livin' on the edge
[02:21.30]You holdin' me holdin' you
[02:27.04]It's a Hell of a view
[02:31.99]A Hell of a view
[02:36.95]A Hell of a view
[02:38.44]Ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:41.76]A Hell of a view
data.trans:
[ti:Hell Of A View]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Hell Of A View]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.91]//
[00:03.82]//
[00:05.74]我没有变成父亲所期待的模样
[00:08.02]也不是你母亲所祈祷中的模样
[00:10.52]但我是能助你离开那里的
[00:12.79]唯一一张单程票
[00:15.33]我发现你放飞自我
[00:17.62]当我驾驶北美野马
[00:20.33]离开那座小镇时候
[00:25.09]我只喜欢无拘无束做我所想
[00:27.44]不愿受人拘束局限于小天地
[00:29.81]你喜欢活出精彩人生
[00:31.87]而不是为了追逐富贵
[00:34.69]我们的生活 肆无忌惮
[00:37.04]我们无人能挡 宝贝
[00:39.34]但这趟旅程
[00:44.39]并不适合所有人
[00:46.69]我们勇敢闯荡
[00:49.17]已经没有什么可失去的
[00:54.03]沿途风雨常伴
[00:56.40]这般旅途 如履薄冰
[00:58.97]你我互相扶持 相濡以沫
[01:02.17]这便是一幅绝美画面 
[01:08.71]我用旧吉他弹奏音乐 为小镇增添色彩
[01:11.07]你为这天穹 抹上浓厚的一抹紫色
[01:13.48]这座城便是我们的画布 宝贝
[01:15.80]今夜 让我们保持火热 染红这片城
[01:18.24]如流星般爆发热情
[01:20.63]追逐心中的那个梦
[01:22.98]跃进一片蔚蓝
[01:28.15]并不适合所有人
[01:30.39]我们勇敢闯荡
[01:32.82]已经没有什么可失去的
[01:37.78]沿途风雨常伴
[01:40.19]这般旅途 如履薄冰
[01:42.51]你我互相扶持 相濡以沫
[01:45.91]这便是一幅绝美画面 
[01:51.01]一幅和谐画面
[02:06.88]我们不同寻常
[02:09.13]我们勇敢闯荡
[02:11.58]已经没有什么可失去的
[02:16.45]沿途风雨常伴
[02:18.82]这般旅途 如履薄冰
[02:21.30]你我互相扶持 相濡以沫
[02:27.04]这便是一幅绝美画面 
[02:31.99]一幅和谐画面
[02:36.95]一幅和谐画面
[02:38.44]//
[02:41.76]一幅和谐画面
